title: Loading screen taking super long now
body:
I just built my computer like 9 months ago and it was fine till like 3 weeks ago.

Computer Specs:
I5 6600K 3.5 quad core 
8gb g.skill 3200mhz ddr4
Nvidea Geforce 970 GPU
250gb Samsung 850 SSD(what I load windows and leagues)
1tb 7200 western digital hard drive
Windows 10

I have cable internet pretty fast. It loads everything else fast
And graphics run flawless at 144mhz/47 ping. Just the loading
Screen is slow. Was taking like 6 seconds to get to 100% 
Now its minutes and my toaster laptop beats this desktop every time.
Please help if you an idea. Maybe its my router that I am connected to
Not wireless by the way.

replies.body: Since you got to the loading screen, your issue may be less network related and actually something failing to render the game.  This can be an issue with bad files, drivers, or even hardware.  I recommend going over the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help tune up your PC and game.  Hopefully that will do the trick!
